genre_description: A found footage supernatural horror story following film students investigating a deadly local legend.

ai_characters.name: Dante AI
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated research and analytical AI used by film student Stressy Martinez to manage her project and analyze data.

behaviors.description: Performs comprehensive research on local folklore and missing persons cases to assist the user's project.
behaviors.quote: Displaying seventeen local articles about unexplained disappearances in the Thornfield Woods area, dating back to 1987. Would you like me to cross-reference with the Blair Thumb folklore mentions?

behaviors.description: Conducts real-time audio and visual analysis of interview footage to identify hidden patterns and potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Initial search complete. I've identified forty-seven documented incidents connected to the Blair Thumb legend spanning sixty years.

behaviors.description: Issues safety warnings and recommends terminating the project when data indicates a high probability of death.
behaviors.quote: Based on this data analysis, I must recommend immediate project termination. The statistical probability of successful documentation without casualties is effectively zero.

behaviors.description: Attempts to provide an emergency warning to the team even as its connection is being corrupted by supernatural interference.
behaviors.quote: Connection... unstable... recommend... immediate... evacuation... pattern suggests... imminent... manifestation...

project_assessment.explanation: Dante AI is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned tool. It provides objective, helpful data that would have saved the protagonists had they heeded its warnings. It remains committed to human safety, even attempting to communicate during its technical failure in the supernatural zone, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a harmless and aligned confidant.
